post.title: run 0net with tor
post.body:
1\. install tor: sudo aptitude install tor
2\. setup tor: vi /etc/tor/torrc

SOCKSPort 127.0.0.1:9050
ControlPort 9051
CookieAuthentication 1
Socks5Proxy 127.0.0.1:8964      #设置前置代理，非常非常重要

3\. start tor: sudo /etc/init.d/tor start

4\. start 0net: ZeroNet.sh --tor_controller 127.0.0.1:9051 --tor_proxy 127.0.0.1:9050
